user.title: Glance Clock Setup
user.description: Select your Glance Clock device to set up.

error.no_devices_found: No Glance Clock devices found. Make sure your device is powered on and in range.
error.device_not_found: Selected device is no longer available.
error.cannot_connect: Cannot connect to device. Check that the device is powered on and nearby.
error.unknown: An unexpected error occurred during setup.

abort.not_supported: This device is not a supported Glance Clock

calibration.title: Glance Clock Calibration
calibration.info: To calibrate your Glance Clock: 1. Press Start Calibration. 2. Wait for the hands to move and stop at 11:59 with a green segment. 3. Remove the minute hand and place it back at 12:00, making both hands perfectly straight. 4. Press Confirm Calibration to finish. During calibration, the clock hands will move and stop at 11:59. If the hands do not align at 12:00 after confirming, repeat the process.

done.title: Calibration Complete
done.done: Calibration complete! If the hands still do not align at 12:00, repeat the process.
